template:
Provide a caption and concise summary of the following text.  
Perform  a NER (Named Entity Recognition) analysis and extract tags  from text, use common tags from common frameworks (SpaCy, NLTK, etc).
Provide a list of maximun 5 keywords based on text.
Output must be formatted as a json string, don't provide code,  with keys:
- caption
- summary
- keywords
- entities: 
TEXT:
{text}
